title: Bug 17423: Duplicate 'Revert' Option in Popup Menu
description: There are two 'Revert' options in the menu.
OB: The 'Revert' option appears twice in the popup menu.
EB: Only one 'Revert' option should be present in the popup menu.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Popup the menu. Observe that there is one 'Revert' option after 'UNDO' and another before 'FORMAT'.
